title.title: Enabling S3-Based Storage for ReportPortal with IAM Roles

contentfulBlogPost.seoDescription: Switch your test reporting tool to S3-backed storage using IAM roles for enhanced security and scalability.
contentfulBlogPost.author: ReportPortal Team
